title: pADupaTTU pizhaippOm
sahitya:
pADupaTTu pizhaippOm manidA palarukku nalam vara uzhaippOm


anupallavi

  ODu paTrit-tirivOm vErvai Utri nam uDalinai vaLarppOm


caraNam 1    kOTi tozhilgaL uNDE ingE kUzhukku panjam iniyuNDO
vADiDum varumaiyellAm sOmbalAl vanda perum tuyarAmE
    caraNam 2    vESat-turavai viTTE karma vIrat-turavigaLAit-talai nimirvOm
kASAya sAmigaLum inik-kapparai EndAmal kalappai piDippOm
    caraNam 3    uzhaikkAda kaigaLukku manidA uNNa urimaiyillai maNNulagil
pazhakkiya kaigaLinAl indap-pAr viNNAgum karma yOgam sheivOm
